actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption of $750 for individuals serving in certain volunteer organizations providing firefighting, ambulance, or rescue services.

summary.text: Provides an additional personal exemption of $750 under the Internal Revenue Code for individuals serving in volunteer organizations providing firefighting, ambulance, or rescue services and meeting minimum State standards for the provision of such services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption of $750 for individuals serving in certain volunteer organizations providing firefighting, ambulance, or rescue services.
